text: The is a university press affiliated with the University of Tokyo in Japan. It was founded in 1951, following the post-World War II reorganization of the university. They received the special prize from the Japan foundation in 1990.Japan Foundation Special Prize, 1990 ==Scientific textbooks== The University of Tokyo Press has published many textbooks for various scientific areas.
